array.string: KEYFILE='/Users/Galaxy/Dropbox/Galaxy/dotfiles/ssh/GalaxyMini'; \ COMMONARG='-o ServerAliveInterval=59 -N -f'; \ NoHostKeyCheck='-o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no'; \ RandomPort='RANDOM % 64000 + 1024'; \ /usr/local/bin/autossh -M $(($RandomPort)) -f galaxy@2403:3a00:202:1129:49:212:210:128 -p 26386 -C -D7575 $COMMONARG -i $KEYFILE; \ /usr/local/bin/autossh -M $(($RandomPort)) -f luolab@eeb-zhanglab.eeb.lsa.umich.edu -C -D8000 $COMMONARG -i $KEYFILE; \ /usr/local/bin/autossh -M $(($RandomPort)) -f galaxy@lab.luo-lab.org $COMMONARG -i $KEYFILE -L8083:192.168.0.83:22 -L8059:192.168.0.83:5900 -L8005:192.168.0.5:22 -L8165:192.168.0.165:22 -L8003:192.168.0.3:22 -L20548:192.168.0.3:548 -L5000:192.168.0.3:5000 -L8202:192.168.0.202:443 -L8881:192.168.0.1:443 -R9922:localhost:22 -D8632;
